about_the_game:
Features

-With live2d technology, all characters are lifelike! Each girl has a variety of expressions!
-Sexy voices of the girls will turn you on!
-Interesting shooting game with a variety of levels

Install the free DLC to unlock some adult content :) Meet all yokai girls in friend book again. Touch them and get to know the girls better.
Thank you very much for supporting ”Yokai's Secret”.
If you like this game, please recommend it, thank you again!

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content.
The characters are all over 18 years old.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/10 32/64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
